status_legend.0: Normal Operation - The turbine is in normal power production mode
status_legend.1: Derated Operation - Derated power generation with a power restriction
status_legend.2: Idling - Asset is idling and waits to operate again
status_legend.3: Service - Asset is in service mode / service team is at the site
status_legend.4: Downtime - Asset is down due a fault or other reasons

summary: Over this 6‑hour window the turbine spent all 37 ten‑minute intervals in Normal Operation, producing near‑rated power on average (power_mean 0.955, low variability power_std 0.028) while wind was generally strong and moderately variable (wind_speed_mean 14.63, std 1.74) with a brief extreme peak (wind_speed_max 39.1). Notable patterns include a consistent power shortfall versus expectation (power_residual_mean −0.093) alongside sustained yaw misalignment (mean 11.89°) and elevated temperatures (temp_mean 71.30), with relatively stable rotor speed (rotor_rpm_std 0.0495) but more variable generator speed (generator_rpm_std 4.56). Pitch averaged 8.91°, consistent with controlled operation under higher winds.
